title: truffle installation broken - what do do?
body:
After a couple of weeks, I came back to truffle to run some tests.

I got the libsass error again, tried to uninstall / reinstall truffle, but no success.

Got many warnings telling me npm was outdated, so I went for a re-installation.
nmp would not cut it, so I decided to use nvm.

@m888m are you running `testrpc`, `geth --rpc` or some other Ethereum client with RPC enabled?
`Error: Invalid JSON RPC response: "Error: connect ECONNREFUSED 127.0.0.1:8545\` suggests it is having trouble connecting to that
I'm going to close this for housekeeping purposes. If you continue to have this error please reopen.

You need to run testrpc in a separate terminal window or run as a background process in order to connect to it. Run this command in another terminal:
`username@workstation$ testrpc -a`
and minimize it and then do whatever you were doing.
